nodes.additionalBodyText: We would love to keep you up–to–date about new case studies and other information from iConsult Cardiology by email. Please let us know if you would like us to contact you.
nodes.footerText: If you haven’t received your certificate within a few minutes, please check your junk folder. If you believe the email has not arrived please contact AHpetvetmarketing.GB@boehringer-ingelheim.com for support.
nodes.formPracticeAddressPlaceholder: e.g. Vet Surgery, Street, Town, Postcode
nodes.marketingRequest1: Yes please, I’d like to hear from iConsult Cardiology
nodes.marketingRequest2: No thanks, I don’t want to hear from iConsult Cardiology
